title: Crypto Industry in New Zealand: Legitimized by Small-Scale Investors
description: The cryptocurrency landscape in New Zealand combines innovation, regulation, and growing market interest. Cryptocurrencies have gained prominence in the nation’s digital economy. New Zealand’s approach to crypto has been cautiously progressive, with grassroots adoption initially driven by small-scale investors and tech-savvy individuals. As global awareness and crypto values increased, so did New Zealand’s interest and […]

title: Nearly 20 more countries set to permanently ditch dollar in 2024
description: The global financial landscape is on the cusp of a seismic shift as nearly 20 countries are poised to abandon the U.S. dollar in favor of their native currencies for global trade in 2024. This move, spearheaded by the expanding influence of BRICS, marks a significant departure from the long-standing USD-dominated system. BRICS Leads the […]

title: U.S. bankruptcies soared in 2023 – but in 2024?
description: 2023 was a year marked by a significant uptick in U.S. bankruptcy filings, a surge largely attributed to the aftermath of pandemic-era economic measures, tightening financial conditions, and rising interest rates. The data, released by Epiq AACER, paints a picture of an economy in flux, grappling with the residual effects of COVID-19 and a landscape […]

title: How Spot Bitcoin ETF Caps Franklin Templeton’s Seven Decades of Prudent Investment Management
description: Franklin Templeton, an esteemed global investment management firm founded in 1947, overseas assets exceeding $1.5 trillion. Known for its diversified, global investment strategies and commitment to client satisfaction, it has adapted to the evolving financial landscape with a focus on digital assets, including Bitcoin. title: China’s top newspaper calls for government to kill crypto
description: China’s most influential legal newspaper, Legal Daily, published by the Chinese Communist Party’s (CCP) Central Commission for Political and Legal Affairs, has issued a clarion call for a more stringent crackdown on cryptocurrency, emphasizing its use in corruption and bribery. This demand aligns with China’s ongoing battle against corruption, reflecting the government’s unwavering stance on […]

title: Crypto Market Dips As Matrixport Forecasts SEC Rejection Of Bitcoin Spot ETFs, See What Really Happened
description: In a surprising turn of events, Matrixport’s latest report has cast a shadow over the crypto market, suggesting that the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) is poised to reject all Bitcoin spot exchange-traded funds (ETFs) in January.  Matrixport predicts that final approval might not materialize until Q2, coupled with […]
